title: Why Cha Eun-woo’s name keeps popping up in politics
content: Young politician Ahn Gwi-ryeong's choice of main opposition leader as her 'ideal type' over K-pop star draws attention Actor and K-pop singer Cha Eun-woo is undoubtedly one of the most popular Korean celebrities at the moment.

title: More webtoon-based series set to entertain TV drama fans
content: More popular webtoon series are being adapted into live-action TV dramas with the return of actors and idols Cha Eun-woo and Suzy to the small screen for their respective series this month. MBC premiered its new romance fantasy “A Good Day to Be a Dog” on Wednesday.

title: Director Yoon Je-kyoon starts ‘K-Pop: Lost in America’ project
content: Korean director Yoon Je-kyoon, who created hit Korean films like “Haeundae” and “Ode to My Father,” has begun working on the script for “K-Pop: Lost in America,” according to CJ ENM on Monday. title: Astro boasts its signature freshness in 3rd LP ‘Drive to the Starry Road’
content: K-pop boy band Astro is back with its signature freshness for its third full-length album, “Drive to the Starry Road,” delving deeper into new sounds with the band’s six years of experience. The six-member act held a press conference in Seoul on Monday afternoon, a few hours ahead of the album’s rel...

title: Boy group Astro to drop 3rd studio album next month
content: K-pop boy group Astro will return with its third full-length album next month, the group's management agency said Tuesday. The six-member group will drop the album titled "Drive to the Starry Road" on May 16, Fantagio said.
